procedure.title: To configure the Open vSwitch (OVS) service
procedure.para: The OVS service provides the underlying virtual networking framework for instances. The integration bridge br-int handles internal instance network traffic within OVS. The external bridge br-ext handles external instance network traffic within OVS. The external bridge requires a port on the physical external network interface to provide instances with external network access. In essence, this port bridges the virtual and physical external networks in your environment.
